properties.areaDesc: Northern Valley; Daniels; Eastern Roosevelt; Sheridan
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 11 at 9:21AM MST until February 12 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Glasgow MT
properties.description:
...Arctic Front Moving In Tonight...

* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches.
Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. Windchills Wednesday 15 to 30
below.

* WHERE...Daniels, Sheridan, Northern Valley and Eastern
Roosevelt Counties.

* WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 6 PM MST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing
snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind
chills as low as 30 below zero could cause frostbite on
exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling. Dress Wednesday in
layers.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 6 PM MST WEDNESDAY
